attributes.action: special schools/school units for high functioning autism and aspergers syndrome
attributes.additional_details: Local authorities should be legally obliged to offer a school place for every child diagnosed with high functioning autism or aspergers syndrome in either a special school for such children or a mainstream school with a separate unit where some key lessons are taught separately.  Parents should still be at liberty to choose to send their children to a mainstream school without such a facility should they prefer.
